input.sentences: the christmas decorations are the best part of the holiday .
each street is filled with them .
it gets me in the spirit just seeing them .
the fashion along with them are so amazing .
the horses were the best part .
output.sentences: Walking through the town and saw the flicker of tree lights.
Not only on a tree but on walkways were beautiful white lights.
Saw a door on a building that was covered in Christmas decorations.
The further we went we saw numerous items that made the town feel like Christmas.
Finally got to our destination and rode a buggy through the town.
